titles.title: Revision Of The Giant Geckos Of New Caledonia (Reptilia: Diplodactylidae: Rhacodactylus)

descriptions.description: Bauer, Aaron M., Jackman, Todd R., Sadlier, Ross A., Whitaker, Anthony H. (2012): Revision of the giant geckos of New Caledonia (Reptilia: Diplodactylidae: Rhacodactylus). Zootaxa 3404: 1-52, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.211734
